name: MagicMirror
body:
### Översikt över resultatet
MagicMirror är ett program för att man enkelt ska kunna sätta upp sin alledess egna magic mirror. Vad finns då för funktionalitet? Du kan bland annat visa reddit-posts, nyheter och vädret. Det finns även ett demo GUI för att testa sin layout innan man använder den på sin spegel.

lägg till bilder

### Tekniker
Programmet använder Jackson för att ta ut information ifrån Json-filer som är hämtade via diverse API.

### Evaluation
We succeeded in implementing the most essential of our ideas. The functionality to display news, Reddit posts, the upcoming weather and bus tables. These are displayed in the demonstration GUI we made. We didn't implement the option to control the program through voice recognition. We found a good API from IBM which matched our needs but since it wasn't free  of charge we excluded that idea. If the service would have been free of charge it wouldn't have been hard to implement since the API had all the functionality that we needed. The idea about controlling Philips hue lights was also excluded. The reason we excluded it was because of complications with the hardware. These extra functionality wouldn't have been any problem to integrate into our program and no changes to the model would have been  

### Project
Made by Kasper Bratz, Philip Pedersen, Jakob Krantz and Kevin Ispiroglu Lindblad
